this_title: The Who Live at the Royal Albert Hall
trans_title: 谁人乐队爱尔伯特音乐厅演唱会
The Who and Special Guests Live at the Royal Albert Hall
introduction: 中文名称：The who儿童癌症基金会募捐演唱会英文名称：The Who Live at the Royal Albert Hall资源类型：DVDRip发行时间：2001年专辑歌手：The who&specail guests地区：英国语言：英语片长：144 minutes演出阵容： (按出场顺序)Bryan Adams .... GuestJohn Bundrick .... The WhoRoger Daltrey .... The WhoJohn Entwistle .... The WhoNoel Gallagher .... Guest (Oasis)Kelly Jones .... Guest (Stereophonics)Nigel Kennedy .... GuestZak Starkey .... The WhoPete Townshend .... The WhoEddie Vedder .... Guest (Pearl Jam)Paul Weller .... Guest内容简介：The Who have been in my mind one of the best (and in some respects the best) solid Rock band for some time now. While they're last 2 studio albums weren't up to standard, overall they had a good run. Last year, this concert was filmed at the end of they're 2000 tour, and I had some mixed feelings about it. It will make any Who fan feel weirded out to see the kids now have gotten, uh, older. And as such, they aren't as razor sharp and excellently sounding as they were in the old days (I'm reminded of the classic rock film The Kids Are Alright if you need example).可比肩The Beatles，喧嚣、嘈杂、叛逆、暴烈的摇滚风格，充满谜一般的矛盾，这就是The Who乐队，与“The Beatles”和“The Rollong”同期雄起于英国乐坛，风靡四十年，备受争议而又大行其道！这场2000年“儿童癌症基金会”募款演唱会中，同台艺人Bryan Adams、Paul Weller等后辈像朝圣般共襄盛举，而The Who的经典作品《I Can`t Explain》、《Relay》、《Who Are You、You Better Bet》等亦毫无保留。四个成员通过不同的行为反映了同样的一种情绪———疯狂，吉他手砸碎了自己的吉他，鼓手推翻了鼓架，主唱放肆地在舞台上发威，贝司手在肆虐地扫射观众，在音乐风格上，Tho Who通过狂暴的吉他和极度活跃的贝司的演奏，加上混乱强劲的鼓点，在传统的摇滚和R(B的风格基础上不断求新，他们的即兴发挥表演也更加深了音乐的魅力。-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------专辑曲目:1 I Can't Explain2 Anyway, Anyhow, Anywhere3 Pinball Wizard4 Relay5 My Wife6 The Kids Are Alright7 Bargain8 Magic Bus9 Who Are You10 Baba O-Riley11 Drowned12 Heart To Hang Onto13 So Sad About Us14 I'm One15 Behind Blue Eyes16 You Better You Bet17 The Real Me18 5:1519 Won't Get Fooled Again20 Substitute21 Let's See Action22 My Generation23 See Me, Feel Me
